preprocess[source]

preprocess(*params:ComplexFloat)->ComplexFloat

preprocess parameters

Note: (1) all arguments are first casted into the same shape. (2) then pairs of arguments are divided into each other to create relative arguments. (3) all arguments are then stacked into one big tensor

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

simple dense neural network
